// Ogma PR6
//notes: (PvE): Ogma is your workhorse pulse. Use Arrowhead if it feels too bouncy, Full Bore on MnK and Hammerforged on controller (or if you don't want to lose the extra stats). For mags, Accurized is the only way to get more range. Otherwise go for Tac or Flared for the extra reload and stability. Last, you've got the perk combos: All4All is a quiet beast, Demo/Well for all the abilities, DemoJunky for grenade builds, and Adaptive Munitions pairs well with Turnabout and Disruption Break.|tags:pve

//notes: (PvE): Who knows what the DPS meta for Light Fall will be, but this will be a contender to do work.
